# Estimated cost of environmental mitigation measures  
For removal decisions, these measures include the construction of alternative water treatment facilities, the establishment of a fish hatchery or similar, revegetation or topography reshaping. For retrofit decisions, these measures may include the construction of fish passage structures.

## Data requirements/sources
Infrastructure or action-based cost estimates
